result.arabic_text: إِن نَّشَأۡ نُنَزِّلۡ عَلَيۡهِم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ ءَايَةٗ فَظَلَّتۡ أَعۡنَٰقُهُمۡ لَهَا خَٰضِعِينَ
result.translation: (4) If We willed, We could send down to them from the sky a sign for which their necks would remain humbled.[1044]
result.footnotes: [1044]- i.e., they would be compelled to believe.
